channel.title: CVE Feed for silverks -- Graphene
channel.description: The latest CVEs for silverks -- Graphene

item.title: CVE-2024-1984|2024-07-08T18:34:45.911Z -- silverks -- graphene
item.description: The Graphene theme for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data via meta tag in all versions up to, and including, 2.9.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated individuals to obtain post contents of password protected posts via the generated source.

item.title: CVE-2024-1984|2024-04-09T18:59:29.548Z -- silverks -- graphene
